column1: Smoque BBQ////Definitely worth the wait. Three of us got there around 5:45 and the line was to the door already. It moved fairly quickly and pretty soon we were waiting for an open table. They really have this process streamlined as best as they can. After you order your food
column2: one of the employees confirms the number of people in your party and as other people leave
column3: they seat you. At that point they start preparing your order.
